title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Content sharing and Admin controls for Teams Rooms on Android

description.newValue:
Enhanced content sharing capabilities with PC audio shared via HDMI and IT Admin controls on automatic sharing of HDMI content. Users can view and add annotations to shared content when a desktop user starts a session in a meeting. And, for Teams Premium users, there is support for watermark-enabled meetings to safeguard confidential information.
GA date: April CY2023
